text:
Newly opened at People’s Park. Took over the same spot as Ya kun previously.

Tried the laksa set which came with kopi or tea. It’s tasty, not too spicy just nice for me. Less lemak and leaning towards more dried shrimp flavor.

Nasi Lemak wasn’t available yet. Hope to try it next time.

Be early to grab seats during lunchtime hours.
Kopi was alright but their chee kueh was so weird; v sticky (maybe over steamed??)and sprinkle of sesame?? Still tasted fine but just not the kueh I was expecting
Ordered iced milk coffee without sugar on two occasions and both times they gave full sugar
Doesn't open on time quite often. Please bring Yakun back.
